Statute.Title: Canada — United States — Mexico Agreement Implementation Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Accord Canada — États Unis — Mexique, Loi de mise en œuvre de l’)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2020, c. 1 (assent: 13.03.2020), the Act, save as below, in force 30.06.2020 see SI/2020-33, as amended by SI/2020-46

Item.Text: — s. 114(1), s. 115, ss. 118(1) and ss. 119, 121 to 126, 128, 130, 132 and 135 in force on the sixth anniversary of the day fixed under s. (1) (01.07.2020) — see s. 213(3)
— ss. 137(1) comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council — see ss. 213(4) — Not in force

CIF.Text: CIF, 2021, c. 23, s. 219 in force on assent 29.06.2021
